survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with AI-Powered Virtual Travel Planning Assistants Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction and gather feedback on the use of AI-powered virtual travel planning assistants to improve service offerings and user experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you use AI-powered virtual travel planning assistants?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for easy selection. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.
